SEO Services

We offer SEO web, and SEM services

What good is offering quality products and services if no one can find you? Cheetah’s SEO web services help your business rise to the top of search results so that you can spend most of your energy providing the value your clients deserve. Get your site in front of your target audience faster with a strategy customised just for you.

Discoverability

Are all of your pages discoverable by search engine bots? Your site should have relevant inbound links from relevant sites.

Indexation

Once your site is discovered, are the URLs unique and correctly indexed? An accurate and comprehensive sitemap & Robots file should be built.

Page Rank

How well do your pages rank? The higher the pages rank, the more visibility your website gets on relevant searches.

Keyword Research

Here are the steps we take to find the right keywords that match your company’s goals.

We assess whether:

The keywords you chose to build your page content reflect what people are searching for

The people who find your site using these keywords get the answers to the questions they are searching for

These keywords help your company reach goals, monetize your campaigns, increase email sign-ups and more

On-Page SEO

On-Page optimisation shows search engines that the content is useful and relevant to the user search. Put simply; it shows search engine crawlers what your website is about. Here are some key points that On-Page optimisation covers.

On-Page SEO

On-Page optimisation shows search engines that the content is useful and relevant to the user search. Put simply; it shows search engine crawlers what your website is about. Here are some key points that On-Page optimisation covers.

H1 and Header Tags:

Each page should have a header that communicates the page's purpose to website visitors and search engines.

Alt Description:

Search engines cannot read images. Therefore you need to add an alternative text behind every image through which you tell the crawlers what the picture is about.

Title Tags:

Summarise your page content with tags that then appear on browsers, organic search engine ads, and social media sites.

Meta Description:

Add a page summary that is presented to the interested user on search results.

Internal Links:

These are links that facilitate the optimal user journey through your site.

Unique Content:

It is important to avoid duplicate content across all of your pages.

Unique Content:

Technical SEO

On many websites, hidden technical issues prevent the search engine bot from properly reading the pages, which prevents them from achieving high rankings and good organic search results. These issues are screened and solved on the technical side of SEO.

Through technical SEO, you can speak the language of web crawlers. Areas covered are, e.g. mobile optimisation, robots.txt file, duplicate content, site structure, speed, errors, sitemaps, etc. All these factors directly affect your website ranking on search engines like Google, Bing, etc

Off-Page SEO

Off-Page SEO is about link building and other signals through which you can convince search engines of the quality and usefulness of your website. Compared to On-Page SEO, Off-page SEO refers to the page ranking factors that occur outside of your websites, such as links to your site on other websites (also called backlinks), social promotions, bookmarkings or blogs.

Off-Page SEO

What do these sites communicate to search engines about your site?

Competitor Analysis

Through comprehensive competitor analysis, you can identify the big players in your industry and reveal who ranks on the first page for the keywords you are targeting.

Optimising for these search queries can improve your position in web results and help you pick up on industry trends. This enables you to plan your online strategy accordingly.
